title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall structure of the distributed system, including how data will flow between components and how meteorological models will be implemented.

title: Develop Data Acquisition Module
description: Create a module to collect data from weather stations and satellites in real-time. This module should be able to handle various data formats, ensure data integrity, and implement error handling mechanisms.

title: Implement Meteorological Models
description: Code the complex meteorological models that will be used for weather prediction. This task includes implementation of numerical weather prediction (NWP) models such as NAM, GFS, and others.

title: Create Real-Time Prediction Algorithm
description: Develop an efficient and accurate algorithm to process the acquired data in real-time for weather prediction. The algorithm should leverage the power of machine learning techniques where applicable.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for visualizing weather data and predictions. The design should cater to the needs of meteorologists, climatologists, and general public.

title: Set Up Database and Data Storage
description: Configure a database (preferably NoSQL for scalability) to store the acquired weather data, predictions, and meteorological model parameters. Consider performance, redundancy, and geographic distribution for efficient data access.

title: Implement DevOps for Deployment and Scaling
description: Create CI/CD pipelines, configure the system to scale based on demand, and implement monitoring mechanisms for resource utilization.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance Testing
description: Perform thorough testing of the system to ensure it functions correctly and can handle real-time data.
dependencies: Set Up Database and Data Storage
Implement DevOps for Deployment and Scaling

title: Secure System Against Potential Threats
description: Thoroughly assess and implement security measures to protect the RealTimeWeatherPredictionCluster from potential threats or vulnerabilities.

title: Document System Design and Functionality
description: Write clear, comprehensive documentation detailing the system design, functionality, and usage. Include sections on architecture, components, interfaces, workflow, APIs, and data flow. Provide examples and best practices for usage.
